name: dominex-server-side
description: **Dominex** is a next-gen social media platform built on **MERN** (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js). It enables users to connect, share, and engage via posts, media, chats, and notifications. With real-time features, secure authentication, and a user-friendly UI, **Dominex** offers an immersive experience while ensuring privacy and security.
